messages.title: Are you willing to take the risk?
messages.content: Whatever happens nationally, Labour and the Greens can't win in Kingston & Surbiton. Everybody around here knows that Labour, the Greens and UKIP can't win around here. Elections have always been between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives - no one else can win in Kingston & Surbiton.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet suggests tactical voting is important as it is a two horse race between Lib Dem and Conservative parties, indicating that a vote for Labour would essentially be letting the Tories win.

images.caption: Graph showing Lib Dem at 50% and Con at 37% marked as a two horse race.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the impossibility of Labour, the Greens, and UKIP winning in the constituency and presents the election as a direct contest between Lib Dems and Conservatives.
